title: Garden State Juice Company
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering
description: A 100% organic/raw/vegan/gluten free juice bar and cafe located in a yoga studio in Voorhees Town Center. Menu changes daily based on availability. Raw juice, raw smoothies, raw gluten free sandwich wraps, raw flax crackers, dehydrated kale chips. Organic soups and salads. Grows own wheatgrass and sprouts. Wheat grass shots, e3 live shots, ginger shots. Seasonal flavors. Wi-Fi.
